Package enemy

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.Body
city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
city.cs.engine.Walker
enemy.Enemy
All Implemented Interfaces:
city.cs.engine.StepListener, EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
Alucard, Goblin, Skeleton
public abstract class Enemy extends city.cs.engine.Walker implements city.cs.engine.StepListener
Abstract class representing an enemy entity in the game.
